name: Labware: Antimutagens
description:
Preserving the integrity of one's genome can be a challenge. However, the preservative properties of blue ice give you an idea...
 
Upon use, every [Gene] and [Side Effect] that the player randomly evolved as a result of [Unstable Genome] is stabilized. Alternatively, the player can sneak while using antimutagens to instead prevent the random evolution of a [Gene] or [Side Effect] for 10 minutes. For the duration, other geneticists can not use [Mutagens] on you, and when you use [Mutagens] on yourself, you do not reroll any [Innate Genes].
